I love this very good not all of the story I understand though not going to lie but still very good I would give it a 4.5 rating at least not a 5 out of 5 rating but still very good what would really help this story if this Male Main character got them all pregnant and they all came out and said your a father now rubbing there big fat pregnant bellies that would be hot.
OK, but who is his actual mother? Like I don't want to read all of it.

@merfifulthug Yeah. The ending felt a little meh didn't it? I feel like if it had of ended with a full page of all of them pressing up against him saying they were gonna start the K.O.W. it would have been a bit better. It just ends on a small panel of him running away and making a joke about picking the maid.
Sooo... it's over or..??

I like how it is the apartment manager who in the end suggest they do a wife competition. Since pretty much the entire story she makes it clear that is what she really wants to be.
Not really a fan of the blonde girl and mom duo. They felt underdeveloped and continually said they were just there for the money. At least most of the mothers are implied to have actual feelings for him and like having a relationship with him.
Full censorship is aids. Why draw porn if you're gonna censor it? Why are japanese laws retarded?
